original_text: Then the fire of the Lord fell and burned up the sacrifice, the wood, the stones and the soil, and also licked up the water in the trench.
korean_text: 이에 여호와의 불이 내려서 번제물과 나무와 돌과 흙을 태우고 또 도랑의 물을 핥은지라

sentences.original_text: Then the fire of the Lord fell
the wood, the stones and the soil
and also licked up the water in the trench
